name: MGRP
description: The MGRP table contains a list of member groups, which are used to identify member populations under different circumstances.

columns.name: MGRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the member group

columns.name: MEM_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the member group

columns.name: CAP_MEM_LIMIT_MAX_AGE
columns.description: Members exceeding this age will not be considered towards the member limit when computing capitation.
